name: Beneath the secrets
description: My first game its got lot of typos. Please enjoy.  Keep in mind this is a game I made for fun. I will say this game is recommended for 13 and up.   It is a very violent game. If you happen to run into a dead end I'm sorry, please go back and progress a different way. With that being said Have fun and give feedback. I will post more content at some point in time. There are multiple ending try and get as many as you can.
